title: We font similar to Lettera-Txt
content:
Im looking for a webfont that is similar to Lettera-txt by Kobi Benezri, any recommendations would be fantastic,

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Lettera txt Rams\_04.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160212/http:/typophile.com/files/Lettera%20txt%20Rams_04.png) | 595.46 KB |
author: Captain Kidd

comments.content: No recommendation, yet, just a public service for those, like me, who can be unfamiliar with the typeface in question: [http://www.lettera-txt.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160212/http:/www.lettera-txt.com/ "http://www.lettera-txt.com")
